caption.p: Comparison of probability distribution of winter/spring and summer/autumn precipitation from 2021 to 2060 and from 2061 to 2100 under RCP2.6,4.5 and 8.5 scenarios relative to 1961~2005 in the Tarim, ( a, c) and Yangtze. ( b, d) River Basin. (Note: the arrows represent the moving directions of future precipitation).
